title: Jens Jørn Mortensen
text: Jens Jørn Mortensen (born 23 February 1927) was a Danish <a href="Olympic%20weightlifting">weightlifter</a>. He competed in the <a href="Weightlifting%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%2090%20kg">men's middle heavyweight event</a> at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
